name: The ZigZag Occasional Table by Kelly Hoppen - Davidson
description:
Discover the ZigZag Occasional Table, a testament to the collaborative brilliance of Kelly Hoppen for DAVIDSON. This luxury occasional table transcends conventional design, standing as a unique blend of elegance and glamour.
The pièce de résistance of the ZigZag table lies in its striking single red lacquered leg, a bold and striking accent that sets it apart. This singular pop of colour amidst the sleek black lacquer tabletop adds a touch of drama and sophistication.
Crafted with precision, the table features three geometric zigzag-shaped legs, offering a distinctive visual appeal. The tabletop, finished in a sophisticated high gloss lacquer, exudes a smooth radiance, complemented by soft angles that lend an air of refinement.
The ZigZag Occasional Table is not just a piece of furniture; it's a statement of style and versatility. Whether styled as a bedside table, showcased in a drawing room, or positioned as an entryway statement, it effortlessly complements contemporary spaces with its unique design.
Elevate your interior with the ZigZag Occasional Table, a fusion of Kelly Hoppen's renowned design sensibilities and DAVIDSON's commitment to luxury craftsmanship. This exceptional piece transcends the ordinary, becoming a centrepiece of sophistication and artistry that will be cherished for years to come.
